name: nodeposthub
description: A Node.js application with authentication, profile management, and CRUD operations for posts, including profile picture support. Built using Express and MongoDB for secure and scalable backend services. This project is a Node.js application that provides user authentication, profile management, and CRUD operations for posts. It also supports profile picture uploads and liking/unliking posts. Built with Express, MongoDB, and EJS for templating, it delivers secure and scalable backend services.
